tool.name: OGS: PVTU2VTU
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'PVTU2VTU'.
tool.command: for i in $input; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; pvtu2vtu --input '$input.element_identifier' #if str($original_mesh).strip() != 'None' and str($original_mesh).strip() != '': --original_mesh '$original_mesh' #end if --output output_1.vtu

param.name: input
param.label: input
param.help: Input (.pvtu). The partitioned input mesh file

param.name: original_mesh
param.label: original mesh
param.help: optional, the original unpartitioned input mesh (*.vtu)

tool.help: This tool runs the **PVTU2VTU** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
